biotools.summary:
A mixed-model approach for powerful testing of genetic associations with cancer risk incorporating tumor characteristics.

Two-stage polytomous logistic regression (TOP): in this package, we developed a two-stage polytomous regression framework to handle cancer data with multivariate tumor characteristics.

The 'TOP' vignette will provide a good start point for using TOP package.

bioschemas.name: MTOP
